Name: Ares Alpha
Description: The Ares Alpha is a versatile assault rifle with grenade launcher attachment.

Name: Fairlight Excalibur
Description: The deck that every decker dreams of owning. It's the Holy Grail of cyberdecks.

Name: Club
Description: The weapon they named the skill after. The stats represent a range of objects, including an axe handle, baseball bat, wrench, crowbar, a tire iron, and a two-by-four with a rusty nail in it. There is a price listed, but it's not overly difficult to find one for free if you know where to look.

name: Extendable Baton
description: The telescoping club can be collapsed, and it can be extended with a sharp flick of the wrist or a wireless signal. When retracted, it's more easily concealed.

name: Nemesis Arms Maul Stun Staff
description: A high-tech stun staff.

name: Sap
description: Also called a blackjack, this is a small, springy club, or a flat piece of iron in a flexible leather covering. It’s specially designed for concealment.

name: Staff
description: This large, heavy stick is popular with magicians going for that traditional look. Available in composite, hardwood, high-carbon steel, and other materials.

name: Stun Baton
description: A standard riot-control weapon, viewed as a tool and symbol of corporate-government oppressors but pragmatically useful to runners. It has ten charges and regains one charge per ten seconds when plugged in.

name: Telescoping Staff
description: This is a metal and composite staff that can telescope down to a reasonable size, one that can be concealed about as easily as a stun baton or a sword. It can be extended and locked in place by whirling it at the correct speed and angle and twisting the grip, or via a wireless signal.

name: Ares 'One' Monosword
description: Double-sided zapping power! The stun staff is basically a staff with stun batons on each end. They’re rather large and a bit ugly but they look quite intimidating in the hands of the guards at Shiawase HQ.

name: Ceramic Knife
description: A knife made from ceramic material for beating metal detectors.

name: Combat Axe
description: A two-handed tungsten-alloy monster, available single- or double-bladed. A hardened thrusting point can be concealed, spring-loaded, in the handle. While it may seem barbaric or primitive, the physical augmentations of 2075 can make an old-school weapon like a combat axe even deadlier than a firearm in the right hands. So go ahead, go medieval.

name: Combat Knife
description: A long, KA-BAR-style fighting knife with a blacked-out blade and a chisel point for punching through armor.

name: Cougar Collapsible Spear
description: A collapsible spear designed for ease of carrying.

name: Cougar Fine Shortblade
description: Finely crafted but also expensive, the Fineblade line of Cougar products are usually only found in the hands of professionals where they belong. This is a short blade, currently fashioned after the Bowie knife. Previous years’ designs have run the gamut since the introduction of the original Fineblade back in the ‘50s.

name: Cougar Fine Longblade
description: Finely crafted but also expensive, the Fineblade line of Cougar products are usually only found in the hands of professionals where they belong. This is a long blade, currently crafted in the fashion of a gladius; and a short blade, currently fashioned after the Bowie knife. Previous years’ designs have run the gamut since the introduction of the original Fineblade back in the ‘50s.

name: Forearm Snap-Blades
description: These are essentially like spurs, only they’re external—painless to install or remove. A forearm sheath conceals three blades that can be extended or retracted via wireless link or muscle movement commands.

name: Highland Forge Claymore
description: Quality killing in the classic Scottish fashion. An ideal accessory for your Heritage Line clothing or for the troll who thinks a regular sword makes a better toothpick. The Highland Forge Claymore comes with a classic leather scabbard to add that authentic look. The blade is custom-forged with a proprietary technique even the masters of Damascus would be unable to match.

name: Horizon-Flynn Rapier
description: Not every street samurai studies the art of kenjutsu. Some prefer the more elegant Fiore dei Liberi and thus choose the rapier over the common katana. Horizon and world-renowned bladesmith Dante Flynn have joined forces to create the ultimate tool for slipping past a flawed defense and finding a home in the heart of an enemy. The Horizon-Flynn blade is a slender composite designed for strength, flexibility, and stability for maximum armor penetration.

name: Katana
description: A long, KA-BAR-style fighting knife with a blacked-out blade and a chisel point for punching through armor.

name: Knife
description: A basic knife for various utility purposes.

name: Lapel Dagger
description: A concealed dagger designed to be worn on the lapel.

name: Mortimer of London "Belgrave" Sword Cane
description: A stylish sword concealed within a walking cane from Mortimer of London.

name: Plasteel Knife
description: A durable plasteel knife designed for utility and combat.

name: Pole Arm
description: This is, at its very essence, a blade on the end of a very long stick. It usually features an axe-head, glaive, spear point, or similar maiming implement. It’s not easy to handle and it’s just about impossible to conceal, but it’s popular both with trolls and with melee combatants looking to safely keep said large trolls at more than arm’s length.

name: Sapphire Knife
description: A high-quality knife with a sapphire blade for enhanced cutting.

name: Survival Knife
description: A fine quality blade—smooth on one edge, serrated on the other—with several accessories, including a GPS monitor, mini-multitool, micro-lighter, and a hidden compartment in the handle. The sides of the steel are coated with a non-toxic chemical that blacks out the blade when inert to prevent unwanted reflection, but can be activated to provide two hours of phosphorescent light. All knives can cut flesh, but a survival knife is better at cutting rope and wood, or otherwise being used as a tool. The survival knife is the kind of gadget that no professional should be without.

name: Sword
description: It’s sharp, it’s heavy, and it will fragging cut you wide open. Available in a wide variety of styles (wakizashi, seax, scimitar, jian, machete, and so on and so forth), this one-handed blade is not as formidable as a katana but is substantially easier to hide.

name: Vibro Knife
description: A knife with a vibrating blade for increased cutting efficiency.

name: Vibro Sword
description: A sword with a vibrating blade for enhanced cutting power.

name: Victorinox Collapsible Hatchet
description: A compact hatchet from Victorinox with a collapsible design.

name: Victorinox Memory Dagger
description: “There can be only One” is Ares latest slogan for this classic. This tool of the modernized street samurai features a monofilament line along the edge that provides unmatched penetration potential.

name: Victorinox Memory Sword
description: Is it a belt, or is it a deadly weapon? A strange question, but one you must ask yourself when it comes to the Memory Blade. Victorinox uses their SmartSteel technology to provide a flexible material that can be commanded to stiffen and form a blade. They currently have two “self-defense” designs available for special order. The Belt, a sword length design worn around the waist, and the Bracelet, a design aimed at lady execs who want a little extra protection. Mostly found on executives with too much money, they often find their way into the shadow market after extraction ops.

name: Ares "Queen of Hearts" Monofilament Garrote
description: A monofilament garrote with a unique design from Ares.

name: Ash Arms Combat Chainsaw
description: A combat chainsaw from Ash Arms designed for brutal close-quarters combat.

name: Ash Arms Monofilament Chainsaw
description: A monofilament chainsaw from Ash Arms, capable of slicing through tough materials.

name: Bullwhip
description: A bullwhip designed for precision and control in various situations.

name: Collapsible Scythe
description: A scythe with a collapsible design for easy transport and concealment.

name: Garrote
description: A simple garrote designed for silent and non-lethal takedowns.

name: Monofilament Chainsaw
description: A chainsaw with a monofilament blade for cutting through various materials.

name: Monofilament Whip
description: A whip with a monofilament edge for precise and deadly attacks.

name: Actioneer Business Clothes
description: A discreetly armored “power suit” is a popular choice among Mr. Johnsons, faces, and fixers looking for a little high-class protection coupled with style. It features a concealable holster (Firearm Accessories, p. 431) in the jacket.

name: Armor Clothing
description: Lightweight ballistic fiber weave makes these garments almost impossible to detect as armor. It doesn’t provide as much protection as real armor, but it’s available in a wide variety of styles.

name: Armor Jacket
description: The most popular armor solution on the streets comes in all styles imaginable. It offers good protection without catching too much attention. But don’t think of wearing one to a dinner party.

name: Armor Vest
description: This modern flexible-wrap vest is designed to be worn under regular clothing without displaying any bulk. A popular and cost-effective option.

name: Chameleon Suit
description: The suit uses the extra information about your surroundings and also gives you a +2 dice pool bonus to Sneaking Tests for hiding. This full-body suit has a smart ruthenium polymer coating supported by a sensor suite; the technology allows it to scan its surroundings and replicate the images at the proper perspectives. Add 2 to your limit when you make Sneaking tests to hide. A chameleon suit is also armored for the wearer’s protection.

name: Full Body Armor
description: Impossible to conceal, this armor is worn by military and security personnel around the world for heavy ops duty. It is styled for intimidation as well as ease of movement, with a full array of tactical holsters, pouches, and webbing, and is certain to draw attention. The suit can be modified for environmental adaptation (hot or cold environments) or chemically sealed to completely protect the wearer from toxic environments and attacks. The suit’s helmet has a Capacity of 6 for the purpose of being equipped with vision or audio enhancements.

name: Full Body Armor, Full Helmet
description: Additional helmet for Full Body Armor. Cannot be bought separately.

name: SynthLeather Jacket
description: Usually made of synthleather unless you’ve got mad nuyen, this type of jacket (waist-length to duster) never goes out of style and even offers a modicum of protection. Just don’t expect it to stop bullets.
